description: if door opened(4),notify me.
If door(5) is locked, after 10sec, turn off the Yeelight Bulb(3)
If motion(18) is detected by Wyze Camera, turn on Philips Hue Light(9) and Mijia Projecter(23)
If door(5) is unlocked between 11pm-4am, record a short vedio clip(18) and turn on notification(18)
Every 30 minutes check PIR motion sensor(19), if 1h since last person detected, close lamp (12-13)
Every 30 minutes check PIR motion sensor21, if 1h since last person detected, close lamp 15&16
If door(5) unlock, when night, then lamp(14) on
If door(5) unlock, then lights(6,8,11,17-18) switch on
If Camera(18) detects person, open Light(9)
If Camera(18) detect person, unmute Projector(23)
After 7 pm, I come to the room, when I open the door, the curtain should be closed
if smartThings Door Sensor (4) Any new motion ,then turn on Yeelight (12-16)
if Wyze Camera（18）Smoke alarm is detected ,then  Alexa Voice Assistance（8） alarm
If curtain(1) off, when motion sensor(21) detect person, then Lamp(15) switch on.
If  curtain(2) off, when motion sensor(21) detect person, then Lamp(16) switch on
When the curtain is closed, please turn on the bulb.
When turn on the bulb, please close the curtain.
If curtain(1) is open when between 8am and 5pm, turn off Yeelight(15)
if Curtain(1) open ,then Curtain(2) open
If curtain(2) is open when between 8am and 5pm, turn off Yeelight(16)
if Curtain(2) open ,then turn off Midea Air Conditioner(10)
